# shazamSignature

**Type Property**

A type that represents a signature.

## Declaration

```swift
static var shazamSignature: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.shazamsignature`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeItem].

## Shazam

- **shazamCustomCatalog**: A type that represents a custom catalog.
